attributes.action: Demand that a national election is held straight away.
attributes.additional_details: The will of the people needs to be heard, and a general election held now, and not at the whim of the opposition and under there undemocratic terms and conditions. Whether you are pro Brexit,  or for remaining in the EU, this deadlock caused by Parliament and it's disenfranchised politicians needs to be resolved by the country, once and for all.
attributes.background: The will of the people needs to be heard, and a general election held now, and not at the whim of the opposition and under there undemocratic terms and conditions.
